Package multicast.protocol

Interface MulticastProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VotingDesk, VotingTerminal
    public interface MulticastProtocol
    A interface that provides the MulticastProtocol standard to be used in the communication between VotingDesk and the VotingTerminal. Any voting terminal that is to be used with the voting desk following this implementation should implement this interface in order to provide compatibility and stability to the implementations.

    This API was made for easy of use and to provide more readability to the code. If you dont want to use this API feel free but be aware that a wrong implementation of the messages that does not follow this protocol might result in the client-server communication not working.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pedro Rodrigues, Miguel Rabuge
    See Also:
    MulticastPacket

    • Method Detail

      • header

        static MulticastPacket header​(java.lang.String source,
                              java.lang.String type)
        A simple header structure that all packets in this protocol use. Most of the packets only store information in the header being but others may add more information to it. This a standard template for all the messages that has a common message pattern.
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of a message
        type - The type of the message being sent
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the header info.

      • vote

        static MulticastPacket vote​(java.lang.String source,
                            java.lang.String election,
                            java.lang.String list)
        A MulticastProtocol message used to transmit a vote from the client to the VotingDesk server.
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        election - The election that is associated with this vote
        list - The list that a person voted.
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the vote info

      • greeting

        static MulticastPacket greeting​(java.lang.String source)
        A greeting message used by the VotingTerminal clients
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the greeting

      • ready

        static MulticastPacket ready​(java.lang.String source)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients when they are ready to receive users
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the ready information

      • bye

        static MulticastPacket bye​(java.lang.String source)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients when they perform a successful shutdown. This is used to tell the server to remove the terminal from the list of active terminals.
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the goodbye information

      • offer

        static MulticastPacket offer​(java.lang.String source)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients when they are finished processing a user and are ready to receive one more job
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the offer information

      • probe

        static MulticastPacket probe​(java.lang.String source)
        A message used by the VotingDesk server on startup. This probe is sent scanning for any VotingTerminal client connected to the multicast discovery group and connecting with them.
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the probe

      • itemList

        static <K,​V> MulticastPacket itemList​(java.lang.String source,
                                            java.lang.String target,
                                            java.util.HashMap<K,​V> items)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients or the VotingDesk servers when there is a need to send a list of items across the multicast group
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        target - The target receiver of the message
        items - The item list contained in the message as a hashmap
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the item list

      • login

        static MulticastPacket login​(java.lang.String source,
                             java.lang.String target,
                             java.lang.String userID,
                             java.lang.String pass)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients when there is a need to transmit a login message contain user critical information e.g credentials
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        target - The target receive of this message
        userID - The id of the user attempting to login
        pass - The password of the user attempting to login
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the item list

      • status

        static MulticastPacket status​(java.lang.String source,
                              java.lang.String target,
                              java.lang.String status)
        A message used by the VotingTerminal clients when there is a need to transmit a status message containing the result code of a given operation
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        target - The target receiver of this message
        status - The status code to be sent
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the status message

      • acknowledge

        static MulticastPacket acknowledge​(java.lang.String source,
                                   java.lang.String target)
        A acknowledgement message used by the VotingTerminal and VotingDesk to confirm that a given operation took place or is completed.
        Parameters:
        source - The sender of the message
        target - The target receiver of this message
        Returns:
        The MulticastPacket containing the acknowledgement message
